newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to Watch - Sept 24.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to Watch - Sept 24.

text.p: -- California Microwave Inc said late Monday it expects a fiscal first quarter loss of about $0.15 a share after lower sales and delayed orders. California Microwave shares closed at 14-1/2 on Monday.
-- Hartford Steam Boiler Inspection & Insurance Co expects third quarter charges of $0.25-$0.30 a share due to storms. It closed off 1/8 to 45-1/4.

-- Micrografx Inc said earnings for its upcoming fiscal quarter should be $0.02-$0.04 per share, well below analysts' estimates of about $0.09. The graphics software company cited non-recurring restructuring expenses.
-- StreamLogic, which makes software and subsytems to manage video and data, said it expects a second quarter loss that could match or exceed its first quarter loss. It closed at 2-5/8.
-- IMP Inc said it expects a significant loss in the second quarter ended September due to weaker demand and restructuring charges. It closed at 6-1/2.
